items.title: Register for our inclusive mentorship program
items.description: Sign up to connect with veterans and military spouses from any training background. Join as a mentor to share your expertise or as a mentee seeking guidance in your tech career journey.

items.title: Commit to our proven mentorship structure
items.description: Our data shows hands-on learners thrive with structure: our program requires at least two meetings weekly, with one dedicated to pair-programming for optimal knowledge transfer and skill development.

items.title: Get matched based on expertise and goals
items.description: Our matching system connects mentors and mentees based on specific skills and career objectives. Whether sharing knowledge or seeking guidance, you'll be paired with someone who complements your professional journey.

items.title: Build lasting professional relationships
items.description: Through regular pair programming sessions, weekly check-ins, and personalized guidance, our mentorship program accelerates learning, builds accountability, and fosters lasting professional growth for everyone involved.
